response.overview: Cameras were constantly rolling during one of the most successful package tours Epitaph has ever executed - The Epitaph Tour 2005! Featuring some of the most talented young bands on the label roster, The Epitaph Tour 2005 simply "went off" in nearly every town it hit. As Matchbook Romance, Motion City Soundtrack, Scatter the Ashes and From First to Last tore up the stages across the county, multiple cameras captured it all!
response.title: Epitaph Tour 2005
